parameters.name: X-Fc-Account-Id
parameters.description: The ID of your Alibaba Cloud account.

parameters.name: X-Fc-Date
parameters.description: The time when the operation is called. The format is: **EEE,d MMM yyyy HH:mm:ss GMT**.

parameters.name: X-Fc-Trace-Id
parameters.description: The trace ID of the request for Function Compute API.

parameters.name: public
parameters.description:
Specifies whether the layer is public.

*   **true**: Public.
*   **false**: Not public.
